message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.CY 

This paper discusses challenges related to Natural Language Generation (NLG) for Explainable AI (XAI). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and generation. The paper also discusses challenges related to AI and machine learning, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses the narrative and causal structure of explanations, which falls under cs.LG (Learning). The paper also highlights the importance of targeting explanations towards their readers and considering human factors, which makes cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the challenges of uncertainty and data quality, which could fall under cs.CY (Computers and Society).
